summary: Adds a spell to let you summon a werewolf! new version also adds it to lvld list so NPC\'s can use it.
descriptionHtml:
My first mod not sure if this has been done yet but anyways adds a spell to summon a werewolf in breeze home which is in whiterun in a chest in the bedroom. It started out as a follower but couldn\'t get him to follow me any advice and tips on that is welcome.
Installation:
put the .esp file in your /skyrim/data folder

Bugs:
I haven\'t noticed any yet.
If you find a problem tell me and I will try to fix it and any ideas on how to improve it are welcome Im new so go easy though.

Compatibility:
should be compatible with all mods as long as they don\'t change the chest in the bedroom in breezehome.

Requirements:
the newest version of skyrim.

V0.6
Added the spell to lvld list and changed the spell to adept from apprentice
I haven\'t tested it much but it should work fine if not let me know and I will try to fix the problem
author: liberator369
